chunk:
withSimplicity Toner - Normal + Combination

Brand: withSimplicity

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Aqua, *Alcohol, *Glycerin, *Aloe Barbadensis (Aloe Vera) Leaf Juice, *Mentha Piperita (Peppermint) Leaf Extract, *Salix Alba (White Willow) Bark Extract, *Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, *Vaccinium Myrtillus (Bilberry) Fruit Extract, *Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, *Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Peel Extract, *Citrus

Willow) Bark Extract, *Saccharum Officinarum (Sugarcane) Extract, *Vaccinium Myrtillus (Bilberry) Fruit Extract, *Acer Saccharum (Sugar Maple) Extract, *Citrus Sinensis (Orange) Peel Extract, *Citrus Limon (Lemon) Peel Extract, *Vaccinium Macrocarpon (Cranberry) Fruit Extract

Directions: Apply to a cotton round and swipe over
face after cleansing. Avoid eye area.
Follow with a moisturizer

Warnings: contains fragrance allergens from
essential oils | contient des allergènes
parfumés provenant d'huiles essentielles:
Limonene, Linalool, Citral
